data.title: Great place to see a concert
data.text: What a cool old theater . If you get there early enough there are some places to sit, which is wonderfu.l It's not all standing room only. There is also a balcony with some seating as well. This place is a short person's dream come true. There really is not a bad seat( or standing spot) in the house. This is a small venue which makes for a very intimate show. I would love to go back and see another concert there!!!

data.title: Fun concert venue
data.text: This is a renovated old theater that has been turned into a concert venue with a bar.  We went there for a concert and had a blast!  The service from the bar to the tables was excellent, our poor server was running.  The drink prices were reasonable and the mixed drinks were good.  Everybody was friendly and relaxed, it was NOT a venue full of drunks like a lot of concert venues.  Just people there to hear good music.

data.title: Nice Venue for concerts
data.text: We went to the Star theater and saw Monophonics play and it was an really nice place to see them play.  They have a dance area, a bar, and seating area.  I will go back here again for sure.
